body: wondering why the one where the woman kills the little boy is missing. also without a translation they lose a lot, they get less interesting in how they are horrible

Yea whatever, killing, raping, abuse, but in the end it's just a drawing, chill fuckers, just because someone can make fictional violence doesn't mean it reflect on someone's desire to do it in real life, ok fine, if you're still much of a moral hypocrite, let's also arrest the makers of fictional violence, literature, movies, video games, tv shows, etc.to be fair and let actual perpetrators of real life violence scott free.
